MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA1 and KA3 postcode areas of Kilmar-nock and Hurlford, this is also affecting properties in the surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however, whilst our engi-neers were working on site, they identified a damaged electricity pole, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.13am on Thursday 19th November 2020.
